column3: The GUI option at least is called "Send without fee _if possible_", it explicitly warns that the transaction may not confirm soon. I may be misunderstanding what this change does, but if not, I'm not sure it needs additional protection.\n

Well, its inconsistent now.  It uses the result of `estimatePriority` to determine if it can send free, unless `estimatePriority` doesn't give you an answer, in which case it'll use `AllowFree`.   This can cause the odd behavior of being more likely to send a low priority transaction for free if you're asking to be confirmed in 1 block (for which no priority is big enough) than if you're asking to
ut ACK.  Makes the gui code consistent with the other free check in the wallet code.\n
Probably needs a slightly longer comment to explain what dPriorityNeeded < 0 means.\n
This is no longer necessary with #6134 \n
